job_details.Vacaturetitel: Patient monitoring R&D Engineer / Project manager
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
You are responsible for design and development of acute patient measurement/management algorithms including ML/AI-based solutions, which are deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings. Project management responsibility preferably thought the scale agile methodologies for 20-40% of time., * Design and develop (AI/ML-based) algorithms which touch more than 600 000 patients annually.
     * Abreast with latest developments in Data and AI Innovation in the field of vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction
     * Lead projects and manage programs to develop of (AI-based) patient measurement and monitoring solutions using lates technologies such as generative AI
     * Join the winning team of Hospital Patient Monitoring, in particular the Data & AI R&D team who works together with other R&D teams, program management, clinical and marketing teams of Hospital Patient Monitoring business
     * Learn how to develop reliable and safe medical-grade solutions which make a real difference in healthcare - improve outcomes and reduce costs.
     * Grow as an engineer, scientist, project / program manager or a leader, selecting between enormous opportunities Philips offers to grow your career. We offer a flexible work schedule, hybrid way of working, and access to local well-being focused activities.
job_details.full_text:
Patient monitoring R&D Engineer / Project manager

You are responsible for design and development of acute patient measurement/management algorithms including ML/AI-based solutions, which are deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings. Project management responsibility preferably thought the scale agile methodologies for 20-40% of time., * Design and develop (AI/ML-based) algorithms which touch more than 600 000 patients annually.
     * Abreast with latest developments in Data and AI Innovation in the field of vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction
     * Lead projects and manage programs to develop of (AI-based) patient measurement and monitoring solutions using lates technologies such as generative AI
     * Join the winning team of Hospital Patient Monitoring, in particular the Data & AI R&D team who works together with other R&D teams, program management, clinical and marketing teams of Hospital Patient Monitoring business
     * Learn how to develop reliable and safe medical-grade solutions which make a real difference in healthcare - improve outcomes and reduce costs.
     * Grow as an engineer, scientist, project / program manager or a leader, selecting between enormous opportunities Philips offers to grow your career. We offer a flexible work schedule, hybrid way of working, and access to local well-being focused activities.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the design and development of algorithms, including ML/AI-based solutions for patient monitoring and risk prediction. While generative AI is mentioned, the core focus is on predictive modeling for vital signs analysis and biomarkers, aligning with the definition of an ML Engineer. The mention of project management is secondary to the core technical responsibilities of developing and deploying these algorithms.

job_tasks.justification: The job explicitly mentions designing and developing ML/AI-based algorithms for patient measurement, management, and risk prediction, which are core modeling activities.
The phrase 'vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction' directly relates to the application of predictive modeling techniques.
job_tasks.phrase: vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'generative AI' indicates the use of advanced modeling techniques, though the primary context remains predictive modeling for healthcare.
The role involves deploying these algorithms into care settings, implying the need for software development to integrate these solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings

job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding the impact on patient outcomes and costs, indicating a need to align technical solutions with business goals in healthcare.
Developing 'medical-grade solutions' implies a need for robust deployment and maintenance processes, aligning with MLOps principles for safety and reliability.
job_tasks.phrase: develop reliable and safe medical-grade solutions

job_tasks.justification: The role mentions project management using agile methodologies, which involves understanding project scope, timelines, and stakeholder needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Project management responsibility preferably thought the scale agile methodologies

soft_skills.phrase: works together with other R&D teams, program management, clinical and marketing teams
Abreast with latest developments in Data and AI Innovation
design and development of acute patient measurement/management algorithms
Grow as an engineer, scientist, project / program manager or a leader
